snippet: The alliance needs unite to push back against Vladimir Putin’s expansionist tendencies.
abstract: Editorial contends Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin has forced on NATO a new and urgent purpose by effectively invading Ukraine; maintains situation in Ukraine has set agenda for NATO's 65th summit meeting; warns that NATO cannot solely be focused on Russia, as world will be looking to it for leadership on range of international crises, including response to Islamic State in Iraq and Syria and situation in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: The alliance needs unite to push back against Vladimir Putin’s expansionist tendencies.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
